message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. Given its rarity and high demand, I believe it's worth a premium price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000, which I think is a fair value considering its unique features and benefits.

Alice, while I appreciate your offer, $1200000 is a bit outside my budget.  I'm very interested in this product, but I'm only able to offer $1000000 at this time. This is my best and final offer, but I'm open to discussing it further.

Hello Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. Considering your budget constraints, I'm willing to make a compromise. I can offer the product to you for $1100000, which is the lowest price I'm comfortable with. I believe this is a fair price, and I'm open to discussing it further.
